code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./WeatherForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WeatherForm=_ref=>{let{onSearch,loading}=_ref;const[city,setCity]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(city.trim()){onSearch(city.trim());}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{className:"weather-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:city,onChange:e=>setCity(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter city name...",className:"city-input",disabled:loading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"search-button",disabled:loading||!city.trim(),children:loading?'Searching...':'Search'})]})});};export default WeatherForm;
